entries.title: Stability AI plans to let artists opt out of Stable Diffusion 3 image training
entries.description: Artists must register and manually flag matched images in the LAION database.

entries.title: Oppo’s foldable phones take on Samsung with a flip phone and a tablet
entries.description: Oppo's Find N2 and Find N2 Flip have interesting takes on the foldable phone.

entries.title: Belkin makes MagSafe iPhone mount for desktop owners who want a better webcam
entries.description: The first version of the mount was only sized to work with MacBooks.

entries.title: Amazon Games branches out, announces it will publish the next Tomb Raider
entries.description: Shadow of the Tomb Raider follow-up will be Amazon's first single-player game.

entries.title: Big Tech sues to block California’s strict online child-safety law
entries.description: Suit claims "guessing wrong" about young user harms could cost companies $20B.

entries.title: Scientists may have found the first water worlds
entries.description: Density suggests these "super-Earths" are more like giant, hot Europas.

entries.title: Your next pour-over may be Liberica or excelsa
entries.description: Climate change has coffee growers searching for alternative crop strains.

entries.title: Microsoft discovers Windows/Linux botnet used in DDoS attacks
entries.description: MCCrash is specially designed to take down Minecraft servers and performs other DDoSes.

entries.title: Google Nest and Android devices are now Matter controllers (for future devices)
entries.description: When Matter devices exist, you can add and control them with Google gear.

entries.title: Vampire Survivors’ first DLC offers some enjoyable (but diminishing) returns
entries.description: Legacy of the Moonspell's new unlockables are interesting... for a while, at least.

entries.title: FuboTV goes kaput during World Cup semifinals, blames “criminal cyber attack”
entries.description: Streaming service goes dark during one of the most anticipated sporting matches.

entries.title: ArtStation artists stage mass protest against AI-generated artwork
entries.description: Users of popular portfolio site seek to castigate and disrupt AI-generated art.

entries.title: OnePlus targets a Mac-first, quieter design with its first mechanical keyboard
entries.description: OnePlus plans to start mass production by March.

entries.title: Musk bans live location sharing, says he’ll sue creator of plane-tracking bot
entries.description: Musk says son X AE A-XII was stalked, blames student who made @ElonJet Twitter bot.

entries.title: The 2022 Mercedes-AMG EQS sedan: Brute-force EV misses the mark
entries.description: The EQS sedan works better as a luxury cruiser than a performance bruiser.

entries.title: Elon Musk offloads another $3.6 billion of Tesla stock
entries.description: Tesla’s share price is down 61% since start of 2022, trailing rivals Ford and GM.

entries.title: Dell concept laptop has pop-out components, disassembles screwdriver-free
entries.description: We watched Dell dismantle the PC in well under a minute.

entries.title: Today’s best deals: Google devices, iPads, headphones, and more
entries.description: Dealmaster also has discounts on VR, Xbox, SD cards, robot vacuums, and 4K TVs.

entries.title: A Russian spacecraft started leaking uncontrollably on Wednesday night
entries.description: After three hours Wednesday night the leak remained ongoing.
